summary: An set of 14 craftable scimitars and sabres
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]This mod adds 14 new craftable scimitars and sabres to the game.The weapons can be crafted at Thieves Guild,
at Arnskar Ember - Master.I only changed his race to Redguard and decorated little bit his shop.[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]The following weapons :
[i]1.[/i] Piranha
[i]2.[/i] Dolblat Hanna
[i]3.[/i] Iris
[i]4.[/i] Lapis Sabre
[i]5.[/i] Lapis Scimitar
[i]6.[/i] Princess Xenthia
[i]7.[/i] Najash
[i]8.[/i] Robin
[i]9.[/i] Noble Scimitar
[i]10.[/i] Glass Scimitar
[i]11.[/i] Ebony Scimitar
[i]12.[/i] Cheap Steel Scimitar
[i]13.[/i] Hammerfell Claymore
[i]14.[/i] Vanilla Scmitar[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]I also reccomend the kuro1n Scim[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/541?tab=description]itar Replacer[/url] for Vanilla Scimitar.[/size][/font]

[i]Credits :
Oarisytos
ImsumDave
JZBai[/i][i]
747823
Farinelli[/i]
author: ibrica_orahovac
